choose.when: SELECT approval_box_id,approval_box_name FROM approval_box WHERE box_delete_status != 1;
choose.otherwise: SELECT ab.approval_box_id, ab.approval_box_name FROM approval_box ab join box_use_department bud ON bud.approval_box_id = ab.approval_box_id join company c ON bud.use_id = c.comp_id AND bud.using_category = 'C' WHERE ab.box_delete_status != 1 AND c.comp_id = #{company};

mapper.select: SELECT ab.approval_box_id, c.comp_id,c.comp_name, ab.approval_box_name, ab.approval_box_used_status, ab.menu_using_range, ab.sort_order FROM approval_box ab JOIN box_use_department bud ON bud.approval_box_id = ab.approval_box_id JOIN company c ON (c.comp_id = bud.use_id AND using_category = 'C') AND ab.approval_box_id =#{boxId};
mapper.update: UPDATE approval_box SET box_delete_status=1 WHERE approval_box_id = #{boxId};
mapper.select: select cc.code_id, cc.code_value from common_code cc join approval_box_view_item abvi on (abvi.code_id = cc.code_id and cc.section_id=004) join approval_box ab on ab.approval_box_id = abvi.approval_box_id where ab.approval_box_id = #{boxId};
select c.comp_id as id, c.comp_name as name from company c join organization_user ou on c.comp_name = ou.comp_name join user u on u.user_id = ou.user_id where u.user_id = #{orgUserId}
select c.comp_id from company c join organization_user ou on c.comp_name = ou.comp_name join user u on u.user_id = ou.user_id where u.user_id = #{userId}

SELECT ab.approval_box_id, ab.approval_box_name FROM approval_box ab join organization_user ou on ou.org_user_id = #{userId} JOIN box_use_department bud ON bud.approval_box_id = ab.approval_box_id JOIN company c ON bud.use_id = c.comp_id AND bud.using_category = 'C' LEFT JOIN department d ON bud.use_id = d.dept_id AND bud.using_category = 'D' LEFT JOIN user u ON bud.use_id = u.user_id AND bud.using_category = 'U' WHERE ab.box_delete_status != 1 AND ab.approval_box_used_status != 0 AND (c.comp_name = ou.comp_name OR d.dept_id=ou.dept_id OR u.user_id = ou.user_id);

SELECT ab.approval_box_id as boxId, ab.approval_box_name as boxName, cc.code_id, cc.code_value FROM common_code cc join approval_box_view_item abvi on (abvi.code_id = cc.code_id and cc.section_id=004) join approval_box ab on ab.approval_box_id = abvi.approval_box_id JOIN box_use_department bud ON bud.approval_box_id = ab.approval_box_id JOIN company c ON bud.use_id = c.comp_id AND bud.using_category = 'C' LEFT JOIN department d ON bud.use_id = d.dept_id AND bud.using_category = 'D' LEFT JOIN user u ON bud.use_id = u.user_id AND bud.using_category = 'U' WHERE ab.box_delete_status != 1 AND ab.approval_box_used_status != 0 AND (c.comp_id = #{company} OR d.dept_id=#{deptId} OR u.user_id = #{orgUserId});
mapper.insert: INSERT IGNORE INTO approval_box_view_item (approval_box_id, code_id) SELECT #{approvalBoxId}, cc.code_id FROM common_code AS cc WHERE cc.code_value = #{item}
mapper.update: UPDATE approval_box AS ab JOIN box_use_department AS bud ON bud.using_category = 'C' join company as c on bud.use_id = c.comp_id SET ab.approval_box_name = CASE WHEN #{approvalBoxName} IS NOT NULL THEN #{approvalBoxName} ELSE ab.approval_box_name END, ab.approval_box_used_status = CASE WHEN #{approvalBoxUsedStatus} IS NOT NULL THEN #{approvalBoxUsedStatus} ELSE ab.approval_box_used_status END, ab.menu_using_range = CASE WHEN #{menuUsingRange} IS NOT NULL THEN #{menuUsingRange} ELSE ab.menu_using_range END, ab.sort_Order = CASE WHEN #{sortOrder} IS NOT NULL THEN #{sortOrder} ELSE ab.sort_Order END WHERE ab.approval_box_id = #{approvalBoxId} AND c.comp_id = #{compId};
mapper.insert: INSERT IGNORE into approval_box (approval_box_name,approval_box_used_status, sort_order, menu_using_range,box_delete_status) values(#{approvalBoxName},#{approvalBoxUsedStatus},#{sortOrder},#{menuUsingRange},0);
mapper.select: select comp_name from company where comp_id = #{compId}

WHERE approval_box_id = #{boxId} AND using_category = 'U' )
